main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted over Burtonwood, England on 17 April 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 15,000 feet traveling at an estimated speed of 600-700 knots., The sighting lasted approximately 1-5 seconds., The object was described as round and bright bluish white with a trail of sparks., A pilot attempted to close in but the object accelerated away., The conclusions include possibilities such as balloon, meteor, or unidentified.
sighted object: a round, bright bluish white object with exhaust or trail
witness description: A pilot from the 3612th Squadron, RE TAC Fighter Aircraft stationed in Burtonwood.
